#summary Links to JavaCL's source code and build instructions
#sidebar TOCWiki

The source code for JavaCL, ScalaCL and OpenCL4Java is hosted on [https://github.com/ochafik/nativelibs4java/tree/master/libraries NativeLibs4Java]'s GitHub repository :
  * [https://github.com/ochafik/nativelibs4java/tree/master/libraries/OpenCL JavaCL / BridJ] (default version, see [MigratingFromJNAToBridJ migration page] if you were using the JNA version before)
  * [https://github.com/ochafik/nativelibs4java/tree/master/libraries/OpenCL-JNA JavaCL / JNA]

Build instructions are on the [Build] page.
